response.original_title: Cloning, Stem Cells, and the Value of Life
response.overview: Human stem cells can be used to cure diseases.  But are embryonic (baby) stem cells as effective as those from adults?  What is the latest research on the topic?  What should a Christian believe?  In Cloning, Stem Cells, and the Value of Life Mike Riddle addresses the ethical issues surrounding embryonic and adult stem cell research, while deflating the myths and false reports given by the media.  The value of human life is inescapable in his hard-hitting conclusion.
response.tagline: Speaker and author Mike Riddle explains the incredible complexity of stem cells!
response.title: Cloning, Stem Cells, and the Value of Life
